text:
Aha! Thanks Ira! I did not know that – nor have I ever really needed to pay
much attention to the Recovery Partition until recent times. 
Cal

metadata.topic: more recovery partition stuff - this is W11 specific
metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] more recovery partition stuff - this is W11 specific
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from calvin@mcltech.ca. Learn why this is important
[https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Aha!  Thanks Ira!  I did not know that – nor have I ever really needed to pay
much attention to the Recovery Partition until recent times. 
Cal 
From: 'Ira Shapiro' via PatchManagement
[mailto:patchmanagement@googlegroups.com]
Sent: January 23, 2024 9:38 PM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: RE: [patchmanagement] more recovery partition stuff - this is W11
specific 
Cal- 
If this is a Dell, that’s how they come from the factory.  One Recovery
partition is Dell Support tools (probably the 1567MB one).  The 990MB one is
probably WinRe. 
Hope that helps. 
Ira
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/A6699D0A6010FD4890DEC629AEF6FADFAC760B7D%40MCLTECH-SBS.mcltech.local
